title: You Can Hear The Tengu's Voice

infobox.Title:: You Can Hear The Tengu's Voice
infobox.Japanese title:: 天狗の声が聞こえる  (Tengu no Koe ga Kikoeru?)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure

Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Shōto Kashii as Shoji Mayama  Masuo Amada as Shigeo Imazu  Jun Konno as Yasutaro Hirai  Tomofumi Tanaka as Policeman  Yuji Mikimoto as Shozo Shimomura

sections.Resolution:
Before Mayama was killed, he had talked to someone. Imazu says that he was blackmailed by someone. Imazu was investigating who was the caller at that time. After several minutes, he didn't come out. So Imazu decided to give up in investigating. He was supposed to blame Imazu and the mask that was missing.
The suspects were Hirai, Imazu and Shimomura, Hirai was out of the suspect, it is because they go with Kogoro, Ran, and Conan together in the cave.
The culprit is Shozo Shimomura. After the crime was committed, he realize that Hirai was opening the cave in 10:00 AM, he thought that Hirai would call the police, but here's no service, so he has the time to commit it. His motive is he can't forgive the mayor, who had taken a bribe to allow a big company to turn the mountain into a landfill. He says that he broke his own city.
